detectors.description:
Unipool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#690-701) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#692)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#695)

	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#L695)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Unipool.stake(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#673-677):
	External calls:
	- super.stake(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#675)
		- returndata = address(token).functionCall(data,SafeERC20: low-level call failed) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#565)
		- uni.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#616)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#480)
	External calls sending eth:
	- super.stake(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#675)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#480)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Staked(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#676)

		- [uni.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#L616)

	External calls sending eth:

detectors.description:
Unipool.withdraw(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#679-684) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp > lockFinish,Locked) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool.sol#680)
